account.title: You are signed in as
account.error: An error occurred while checking your account
account.enter_x_to_access: Please enter {{x}} to access this account

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Don't have an account yet? Go to {{link}}
login.error: Invalid username and/or password. Please check your credentials and try again

signout.title: Sign Out
signout.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

stream_not_found.title: Stream not found
stream_not_found.message: Unfortunately this stream could not be started.

concurrent_streams.title: Limit reached
concurrent_streams.message: The number of concurrent streams has been reached. Please stop the playback on another device and try again.

latest-episode.text: You have finished the latest episode of {{label}}

exit.title: Exit
exit.content: Are you sure you want to close the application?

errors.no_content: No purchase history has been found

error.title: Something went wrong
error.content: An error occured while loading the page

no_epg_data.title: No EPG data available
no_epg_data.content: No EPG data available, please try again later.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.content: There are no Facebook friends using SmartOTT

create.title: Facebook Account
create.content: You don't have a Facebook account linked to your profile. Please go to {{link}} to link one

errors.call_error: An error happened while requesting content
errors.no_content: No content has been found, try another search

search.message: We need at least 3 characters to start searching

network.offline: Internet connection has been lost. Press button to exit.

parental.enter_pin_to_watch: Please enter your PIN to watch "{{label}}"
parental.parental_warning_description: You must be over the age of 18 in order to view this content.

errors.error: The subscriber status is incorrect or the subscriber account has been suspended

device.title: Adding your device to the household
device.text: You are about to register this device with the household. Following completion of this step, you will be able to register {{remainingSlots}} additional devices.

errors.Unknown: It was not possible to activate your device. Please try again.
errors.ExceededLimit: You have reached the maximum number of devices. Please remove a device before you add another one.
errors.DeviceAlreadyExists: This device is already registered to another account.

anotherDomain.title: Another domain
anotherDomain.text: Your device is already registered to another domain. Do you want to unregister it and register your device to this domain?

dialog.title: Content restricted
dialog.log_in_content: You must be signed in to complete this action. Please sign in and try again.
dialog.subscribe_content: You'll need to purchase this content in order to watch it. Please visit our website and try again.
dialog.geoblock_content: This content is not available in your location.

subtitle.rtefincons: No account? Go to rte.ie/account to register

rtefincons: 1. Go to rte.ie/connect on your phone or computer
2. Sign in to your RTÉ Account
3. Enter the Connect Code you see below and name your device
4. Wait a few seconds and you should automatically be signed in here

subtitle.rtefincons: Choose one of the following options, or press "Skip" to log in later

options.connectcode: Log in with a Connect Code
